name: Greek Omelet
description: Make healthy, fluffy omelets with less fuss.

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix, Bruschetta Seasoning or Vegetable Seasoning

preparation: Use a basting brush to lightly oil an Omelet Maker. Whisk eggs and milk until frothy, then pour into omelet maker.
Top with seasoning, spinach, and feta cheese.
Close lid and microwave on high for 2â€“3 minutes.
Loosen omelet with a spatula, slide onto a plate, and serve.
